summary: This bill, the "Comprehensive Reimbursement Initiative Targeting Investment and Care in rural Locations" or the "CRITICAL Act," amends the Social Security Act to provide increased reimbursement rates for critical access hospitals located in noncontiguous states. Specifically, it increases reimbursement for inpatient, outpatient, ambulance, and skilled nursing facility services provided by those hospitals, starting January 1, 2026. This aims to support healthcare in rural and geographically isolated areas.
